deterministic_rule: Split on '—'; take left side tokens excluding supertypes; map to canonical cardtypes
Tokens on left side that match known supertypes set
notes: Known set versioned in rules JSON

deterministic_rule: After '—', split by spaces; keep exact casing as printed; store canonical casing from DB
When rules phrase refers to '<Subtype> creature/spell/permanent', capture subtype token(s) as type_subset
